programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: After treating Jan Di in a harsh manner, Mr. Jung prepares everything so that Jun-Pyo can go see her in Seoul.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Jan Di’s family hear about Jun-pyo’s engagement and ask her dejectedly if it’s true.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Ji-hoo can see how hurt Jan Di is by the kiss, and continues to follow her as she walks around in a daze.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Jun-pyo starts seeing Jae-Kyung in a different way.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Woo-bin tries to talk some sense into Yi-jung, who is hell-bent on drinking himself into oblivion.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: At home, Jun-hee thinks back to how her mother interfered in her life.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Yi-jung is waiting outside for Eun-jae, happy to see her until he overhears her phone conversation.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Jun-pyo pleads for Jan Di to tell him not to get married.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Jun-pyo tells Jan Di that he'll protect her but she says that she doesn't want to be protected.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Perhaps feeling it’s time to reveal one truth, Mr. Jung leads Jun-hee to the mystery patient’s bedside.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Jun-pyo asks Yumi to make the lunchbox again

programme.title: The Secret Romantic Guesthouse
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Secret Romantic Guesthouse
programme.desc: Kang San was fooled by Dan Oh's trick and ended up staying at the Summer Palace.

programme.title: The Secret Romantic Guesthouse
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Secret Romantic Guesthouse
programme.desc: Dan Oh is overwhelmed by the debt left behind by his father and the scholars comfort her in their own ways.

programme.title: The Secret Romantic Guesthouse
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Secret Romantic Guesthouse
programme.desc: Dan Oh heads to Gwacheonhyeon to find clues about the deceased.

programme.title: The Secret Romantic Guesthouse
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Secret Romantic Guesthouse
programme.desc: Despite the concerns of the scholars, Dan Oh gradually gets closer to Lee Seol.

programme.title: The Secret Romantic Guesthouse
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Secret Romantic Guesthouse
programme.desc: Dan Oh begins to doubt the identity of Kang San, who was hit with a poisoned arrow.

programme.title: The Secret Romantic Guesthouse
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Secret Romantic Guesthouse
programme.desc: The Chief Administrator notices that Dan Oh has found out something.

programme.title: The Secret Romantic Guesthouse
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 The Secret Romantic Guesthouse
programme.desc: Dan Oh and the Summer Palace family escape with the help of a swordsman who appears wearing a mask.

programme.title: Lies Hidden in My Garden
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Lies Hidden in My Garden
programme.desc: A strange backyard smell shatters Joo Ran’s perfect life, while Sang Eun reels from Yoon Beom’s sudden death.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: On the quest for a cure for the virus, the group makes its way to the greenhouse where Batch 47 is being grown by Odegard. There, Odegard warns them about zombie-plant hybrids.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy's past comes back to haunt him when Serena tracks him down. The team stumbles upon a hidden farm.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy separates from the group out of fear that they may take the baby away - and kill her. Vasquez and Warren are injured and wind up in an abandoned hospital. 10K is forced to make a tragic decision during a conflict with Cassandra.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Tricked into a trap by use of a fresh brain lure, Murphy is captured by a zombie fan known as "The Collector."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near Roswell, New Mexico, the group encounters a community, led by a woman called Bernadette, which they believe is above a secret underground base that may contain useful equipment.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy, Warren, Vasquez and Addy find themselves at a casino while 10K and Doc are captured by Natives.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group becomes embroiled in corporate politics while seeking shelter at a hotel overtaken by white-collar survivors. There, Murphy is hunted.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near the Mexican border, the group is rescued from a zombie hoard by Escorpion, who leads them to La Reina, the "Queen of the Dead." As a bounty for Murphy, La Reina offers them a reward or a free pass to join her group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team finally arrives in California. As they near their goal, each member thinks back to where they were at the beginning of the apocalypse and what it took to get where they are today.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Los Angeles, the team drives through the abandoned city to the coordinates of the mobile CDC lab provided by Citizen Z. There, they discover the lab isn't just a lab - it's a submarine.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 1.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 2.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While on the road to establish his headquarters in Spokane, Murphy saves the life of a dying girl. When her parents show up and ask to be bitten too, his mission gains momentum. Meanwhile, Warren leads the new mission group to a strange town.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: As more people flock to Murphy's new cult, Dr. Merch works on a blend vaccine as well as a booster shot to slow to Murphy's descent into zombiedom.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Alone and suffering from the effects of Merch's booster, 10K barely escapes Murphy and is stalked by a blend.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc finds himself taken captive by a psychotic nurse and her surviving mental patients, and he later discovers that 10K is being held too.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Looking for Lucy, Doc and Addy run into Skeezy and Sketch, who is running for "President of the Apocalypse."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the others inspect Murphytown and realize they are going to need a bigger army to extract Murphy. Warren finds an old ally in El Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Upon finding Lucy, Doc and Addy work hard to stay alive and earn the family's trust. After a dangerous game of zombie hide-and-seek, an apocalyptic fairytale and a close call with an ender, Addy and Doc convince the family to follow them to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc tries to find a way to tell Warren about Lucy's kidnapping. In the meantime, he encounters a radio tower and castle-like compound inhabited by three attractive, crafty ladies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy is being pummeled with whatever The Man can throw at her - and Lucy does the same right back.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy and Doc catch up with Warren, but the reunion is short-lived as the group faces the biggest battle yet.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Two years later, things have gotten worse: Warren's apocalyptic dreams continue while the group fights MAD-Zs.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Driven by her dream of a black rainbow and flesh-eating rain, Warren and Murphy escape Zona, while Doc, 10K and Sarge are pinned down by snipers.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following Warren's dream, the team doesn't stop while crossing the Great Pile, a seemingly endless landscape of rubble and destruction.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team is captured and enslaved in an elaborate underground facility, forced by their mysterious captors to perform a series of bizarre and dangerous tasks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lucy fights to save Murphy's life, while Warren and the others battle a biologically modified zombie.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Shaken by the death a groupmate, something snaps in Murphy. Warren is unable to stop him and the others from committing an atrocity as misplaced revenge.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group encounter a mysterious stranger who they think is a grave robber - but turns out to be something much more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Chicago, Doc and Murphy encounter a mysterious - and murderous - group, including Sketchy and Skeezy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group returns to Mercy Labs, where they first met The Man, to retrieve another item from Warren's dreams.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: At Mount Weather, the group learns the thumb print of the president is necessary to achieve Warren's goal.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the mind-bending season finale, the team arrives in Washington, D.C. and the secret of Warren's dreams is revealed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the outpost Altura, 10K searches for Red, Warren discovers George is an old friend, Murphy encounters Sun Mei in her new lab and Doc runs into Citizen Z.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Panic and anti-talker sentiments flare after an explosion derails the vote - and rumors blame a talker. 10K, Sarge and Red are attacked by old-school zombies and suffer devastating losses, and Murphy finds his loyal blends are still out there.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: 10K and Red attend a ceremony for those lost in Altura. Warren, Doc, Citizen Z and George arrive in Pacifica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A new spate of terrorist bombings hit Pacifica. In order to follow his vision for human-talker unity, George seeks those responsible for the attacks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc breaks out special medicine to treat George's injury and explains the Founding Fathers, the Bill of Rights and more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group arrives at the farming outpost that produces flour for Z-bizkuits, but it is overrun by zombies, Pandora and starving talkers laying in wait to kill them.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group is reunited with old Native friends who are defending a dam that controls Newmerica's water from talkers. In order to help, Doc and Warren undertake spiritual journeys.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group discovers Altura militia forces have enslaved talkers to mine hazardous waste for Z-bizkuits.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: With help from renegade hackers, Warren and George hack Altura's defenses and discover Estes' secret plan.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren works with humans, talkers and blends to help George defeat Estes and Pandora. Newmericans can finally vote, but before Warren can relax, Cooper reappears with a shocking revelation.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A team starts its journey transporting the only survivor of the zombie virus from New York to Los Angeles, CA.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of gas, the team follows a suspicious stranger to a damaged oil refinery deep inside a New Jersey no-go zone packed with zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Citizen Z directs the team to a rumored helicopter controlled by a mysterious general living atop a heavily guarded skyscraper - where zombies roam freely.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A tornado forces the team to Warren's hometown, where she searches for her husband who she lost track of in the early days of the apocalypse.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After taking refuge in a safe enclave where no weapons are allowed, the team finds itself thrust into a battle for control of the compound against a zombie-worshipping cult.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lost and out of water in rural Kansas, the team is on the verge of breaking up before arriving at a Wild West-style bar. Guns, liquor and a zombie-shooting contest: what could go wrong?

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Split off from the others, Mack and Addy find themselves trapped by a zombie they just can't kill. A series of escalating fights forces them to confront an ugly truth hidden in their past.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While in South Dakota, an imminent meltdown forces the team to help the locals repair a nearby nuclear power plant full of radiated zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of shelter and supplies, the team seeks refuge in an all-female compound where men are not allowed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Some strangers earn their ways into the team, taking a keen interest in Murphy, but things take a deadly turn.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A change in plans has the team re-routed to a Colorado viral lab located in a nuclear missile silo. The team searches for Dr. Merch, the developer of the experimental vaccine previously given to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Each member of the group goes through a near-death experience while being attacked by bounty hunters. Mack is bitten after being caught in a zombie-infested stairwell.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After finally tracking down Murphy, the group comes across a caravan of survivors transporting victims of the nuclear blast to safety. Along the way, the mission is attacked by "blasters," zombies mutated by the radioactive fallout.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: On the quest for a cure for the virus, the group makes its way to the greenhouse where Batch 47 is being grown by Odegard. There, Odegard warns them about zombie-plant hybrids.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy's past comes back to haunt him when Serena tracks him down. The team stumbles upon a hidden farm.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While crossing the Mississippi River, the group is involved in an accident and 10K is separated. At a nearby settlement, 10K and some new friends run into trouble with the settlement's leader, Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Tricked into a trap by use of a fresh brain lure, Murphy is captured by a zombie fan known as "The Collector."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near Roswell, New Mexico, the group encounters a community, led by a woman called Bernadette, which they believe is above a secret underground base that may contain useful equipment.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy, Warren, Vasquez and Addy find themselves at a casino while 10K and Doc are captured by Natives.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near the Mexican border, the group is rescued from a zombie hoard by Escorpion, who leads them to La Reina, the "Queen of the Dead." As a bounty for Murphy, La Reina offers them a reward or a free pass to join her group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: All hell breaks loose when it's discovered that not only does Dr. Kurian's vaccine not work but everyone who was injected will come under Murphy's control after an incubation period.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team finally arrives in California. As they near their goal, each member thinks back to where they were at the beginning of the apocalypse and what it took to get where they are today.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Los Angeles, the team drives through the abandoned city to the coordinates of the mobile CDC lab provided by Citizen Z. There, they discover the lab isn't just a lab - it's a submarine.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 1.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group are taken prisoner while Murphy manages to escape with his newly formed group of blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While on the road to establish his headquarters in Spokane, Murphy saves the life of a dying girl. When her parents show up and ask to be bitten too, his mission gains momentum. Meanwhile, Warren leads the new mission group to a strange town.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: As more people flock to Murphy's new cult, Dr. Merch works on a blend vaccine as well as a booster shot to slow to Murphy's descent into zombiedom.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc finds himself taken captive by a psychotic nurse and her surviving mental patients, and he later discovers that 10K is being held too.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Seemingly injected with the blend vaccine, The Man attempts to kidnap Murphy but underestimates the strength of Murphy's followers. However, he does manage to learn about Lucy's existence. 10K reunites with the group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Looking for Lucy, Doc and Addy run into Skeezy and Sketch, who is running for "President of the Apocalypse."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the others inspect Murphytown and realize they are going to need a bigger army to extract Murphy. Warren finds an old ally in El Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc tries to find a way to tell Warren about Lucy's kidnapping. In the meantime, he encounters a radio tower and castle-like compound inhabited by three attractive, crafty ladies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren leads an attack against Murphytown to extract its smug leader.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy is being pummeled with whatever The Man can throw at her - and Lucy does the same right back.

programme.title: Rewolwerowiec z Jalisco
programme.desc: Salvador kocha się w pięknej Marii, niestety jej ojciec nie akceptuje ich związku.

programme.title: Dolina Zemsty
programme.desc: Synowie barona bydła z Kolorado, jeden biologiczny, a drugi adoptowany, żywią do siebie urazę i walczą o kontrolę nad imperium ojca.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja - Odcinki 19, 20, 21
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Spóźniona zemsta
programme.desc: Chłopiec z Dzikiego Zachodu, nawiedzany wspomnieniami masakry rodziny, dorasta z pragnieniem zemsty. Zakochuje się w przybranej siostrze, walczy z zakazanym uczuciem, wrogością brata i groźbą śmierci ze strony członka rodziny.

programme.title: Pojedynek w Durango
programme.desc: Dan Tomlinson, znany kiedyś jako Will Sabre, próbuje zerwać z przeszłością, ale jego były gang chce go zmusić do powrotu. Po drodze spotyka osieroconego chłopca i zaczyna pracę w banku. Gdy dochodzi do napadu, Dan zostaje oskarżony o współpracę z przestępcami i musi oczyścić swoje imię.

programme.title: Na samotnej drodze
programme.desc: Weteran Johnny Rush wraca do domu, by odkryć, że jego ranczo zostało skonfiskowane przez barona bydła. Dowiaduje się, że jego dziewczyna jest zaręczona z baronem, aby ratować finansowo zagrożone ranczo jej ojca. Po utracie ręki w walce z poplecznikami barona, Rush zaczyna używać łuku, by pomścić swoje straty.

programme.title: Ogród zła
programme.desc: Trzech Amerykanów otrzymuje propozycję: za 2000 dolarów mają uratować męża kobiety uwięzionego w kopalni złota w górach Meksyku. W trakcie podróży każdy z nich kalkuluje szanse na zdobycie kobiety lub kopalni, o ile przeżyją tę niebezpieczną misję.

programme.title: Śmierć Nie Dba o Czas
programme.desc: Meksykański chłop eksmitowany ze swojej ziemi staje się rozwścieczonym banitą. W końcu zostaje aresztowany i trafia do więzienia.

programme.title: Towarzysze Chwały
programme.desc: Czy dla dwóch oficerów kawalerii może być coś gorszego niż walka z Indianami? Tak. To walczyć o tę samą kobietę.

programme.title: Wielki Skarb
programme.desc: Ślepy mężczyzna chce ukraść złoto samozwańczego gubernatora stanu Chihuahua. Nie może tego zrobić sam, więc najmuje do tego zadania czterech oszustów.

programme.title: Siedem Rewolwerów, Jedna Masakra
programme.desc: Mężczyzna zostaje aresztowany, osądzony i skazany za napad, który w rzeczywistości popełnił ktoś inny.

programme.title: El Rojo
programme.desc: Rodzina Sorensonów zostaje zamordowana. Wygląda na to, że przez Indian. Obok miejsca zbrodni wyrasta miasteczko Gold Hill, którym rządzi grupę biznesmenów.

programme.title: Znajdź Miejsce W Którym Możesz Umrzeć
programme.desc: Wyrzutek, żołnierz Konfederacji, odkupuje swoje winy broniąc kobiety przed bandytami, którzy są gotowi ją zabić dla kopalni złota.

programme.title: Święta Trójca i Czterej Rewolwerowcy
programme.desc: Święta Trójca i Czterej Rewolwerowcy. Handel bronią z Indianami z jednej strony i przejmowanie kopalni złota z drugiej to główne zainteresowania Quina i Gomeza, bardzo podejrzanych gości w gospodzie Papy Martineza.

programme.title: Dla Przyjaciela Wszystko
programme.desc: Dwóch kowbojów zostaje okradzionych ze złota w skalistych górach i postanawiają walczyć z bandytami. "Anything for a Friend" (1972) to komediowy Italo-Western autorstwa Demofilo Fidaniego, który po raz pierwszy został pokazany przez telewizję w Niemczech.

programme.title: Ponad Nienawiścią
programme.desc: Rodzina pionierów zostaje niemal doszczętnie zniszczona przez żądnych zemsty Indian: Mały George został pozostawiony zemdlony na ziemi, a jego mała siostra adoptowana przez indiańskiego wodza. Los sprawi, że znów się połączą.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja - Odcinki 22, 23, 24
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Anioł i złoczyńca
programme.desc: Quirt Evans, wszechstronny złoczyńca, wraca do zdrowia. Opiekuje się nim Penelope Worth, kwakierka. Quirt musi wybrać między swoim światem a światem, w którym żyje Penelope.

programme.title: Keoma
programme.desc: Półkrwi były rewolwerowiec z Unii próbuje uchronić swoje ogarnięte zarazą rodzinne miasto przed przejęciem władzy przez rasistowskich przyrodnich braci i konfederackiego tyrana.

programme.title: Zabójstwo za Sto Tysięcy Dolarów
programme.desc: Łowca nagród Johnny Forest stara się spełnić prośbę umierającej matki - ma sprowadzić swojego wyjętego spod prawa brata Clinta żywego do domu.

programme.title: Na celowniku
programme.desc: Ostatni z serii napadów na dyliżanse na terytorium Arizony dokonuje się na dyliżans, w którym pasażerami są Mike Ryan, tajny agent linii dyliżansowej i Molly Jones, córka miejscowego szeryfa. Bandana maskująca jednego z rabusiów zsuwa się; przywódcę gangu Velvet Clark musi go zabić. Ten ostatni podszywa się pod szanowanego obywatela społeczności i pianistę. Mieszkańcy miasteczka są na tyle wzburzeni ciągłymi napadami, że proszą szeryfa Toma Jonesa o rezygnację, ale zgadzają się dać mu więcej czasu, gdy przyjmuje Ryana jako zastępcę. Poszlaki prowadzą szeryfa do Clarka, ale ten zabija go i ucieka. Ryan tropi go w Gunsight Ridge, gdzie dochodzi do strzelaniny.

programme.title: Johnny Yuma
programme.desc: Chciwa wdowa i jej brat knują morderstwo, by przejąć ziemię po zmarłym. Gdy spadkobierca okazuje się waleczny i sprytny, wynajęty zabójca nieoczekiwanie zmienia stronę. Sojusze się zmieniają, a gra o spadek zamienia się w krwawą rozgrywkę.

programme.title: Strzelaj Joe, Strzelaj!
programme.desc: Bandyci poszukują człowieka o imieniu Joe, który posiada mapę do skradzionych pieniędzy zabranych przez ich szefa podczas napadu na bank.

programme.title: Buntowniczka
programme.desc: Ann Shelby, której rodzina jest sprzymierzona z osławionym Williamem Quantrillem, staje się banitką. Ann pragnie zemścić się na Indianinie, który zabił jej brata.

programme.title: Madron
programme.desc: Po ataku Apaczów siostra Mary samotnie przemierza pustynię. Pomaga jej Madron – twardy rewolwerowiec. Choć z początku niechętny, z czasem zaczyna podziwiać jej siłę. Wspólna droga prowadzi przez zasadzki bandytów i spotkanie z dawnym wrogiem, Apaczem Samem Redem.

programme.title: Przeklęte Rewolwery z Dallas
programme.desc: Wyjęty spod prawa Szybkoręki (Álvarez) napada na dyliżans, którym podróżuje Clay Stone (Beir), piosenkarka Katy Dior (Marandi) i hazardzista Fred Foster (Mathot). Stone będzie szukał zemsty.

programme.title: Tequila Joe
programme.desc: Młody zastępca próbuje otrzeźwić i ożywić spłukanego szeryfa-alkoholika, aby rozprawić się z walczącymi ze sobą gangami przestępców na Dzikim Zachodzie.

programme.title: Kid, Postrach Zachodu
programme.desc: Andrea Balestri jako Kid Terror O'Hara, przywódca grupy dzieci, które w opuszczonym miasteczku Torque, bawią się w kowbojskie życie.

programme.title: Bóg Jest Moim Coltem
programme.desc: Wysłannik armii działając pod przykrywką ma oczyścić skorumpowane Langford City z meksykańskich bandytów.

programme.title: Masakra w Dragoon Wells
programme.desc: Oficer kawalerii, jedyny ocalały z ataku Indian, wraz z wagonem więźniów przemierza wrogie tereny indiańskie.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja - Odcinki 25,26,27
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Skalpy
programme.desc: Dowódca teksańskiego fortu w czasie wojny secesyjnej odmawia poddania się żołnierzom Unii. Próbuje on kupić córkę wodza miejscowego plemienia Indian. Wódz odmawia, a konfederaci wyrzynają plemię i porywają młodą Indiankę. Dziewczynie udaje się uciec. Ukrywa się u ranczera, który nie lubi Indian, ale jeszcze bardziej nienawidzi konfederatów. Ta dziwna para łączy siły, by dokonać ostatecznej zemsty na południowcach.

programme.title: Szlak do Santa Fe
programme.desc: W 1854 roku Jeb Stuart, George Custer i inni absolwenci West Point zostają oddelegowani do Kansas, aby pomóc w pacyfikacji terytorium przed wznowieniem budowy linii kolejowej do Santa Fe.

programme.title: Generał
programme.desc: Kolorowa wersja filmu. Kiedy szpiedzy Unii kradną ukochaną lokomotywę inżyniera, ten samotnie ściga ją prosto przez linie wroga.

programme.title: Dyliżans
programme.desc: Grupa podróżująca dyliżansem zbliża się do siebie z powodu zagrożenia ze strony Geronimo i przy okazji dowiaduje się więcej o sobie nawzajem.

programme.title: Miasteczko Abilene
programme.desc: Pierwszy raz w kolorze! Klasyczny amerykański western z 1946 roku z Randolphem Scottem w roli głównej: Miasteczko Abilene. Szeryf stara się zapobiec sporom między osadnikami na Dzikim Zachodzie po wojnie secesyjnej.

programme.title: Santee
programme.desc: Jody dołącza do ojca, nie wiedząc, że to przestępca. Po osieroceniu przez łowcę nagród Santee, z którym zawiązuje ojcowską więź, przeszłość powraca – gang odpowiedzialny za śmierć Santee próbuje zniszczyć ich nową rodzinę.

programme.title: Samotna Siódemka
programme.desc: Rodzina z pogranicza przemierza Stany Zjednoczone pociągiem z wagonami, w nadziei na lepsze życie na Terytorium Oregonu.

programme.title: Próba Miłości
programme.desc: Kiedy Charlotte Sutter zostaje porwana przez Apaczów, jej brat Sam, wspomagany przez starego pijanego poszukiwacza, wyrusza na jej poszukiwanie.

programme.title: Śmierć nikczemnym!
programme.desc: Dobry samarytanin Benny Hudson i zagubiona Jenny trafiają do kryjówki gangu w opuszczonym mieście. Tam są torturowani, walcząc o przetrwanie w świecie pełnym niebezpieczeństw i zdrad. Czy uda im się ujść z życiem?

programme.title: Yuma
programme.desc: Yuma to western z 1971 roku, z Clintem Walkerem w roli głównej, wyreżyserowany przez Teda Posta i nakręcony w Old Tucson. Film był pierwotnie pilotem telewizyjnym, który pojawił się w programie ABC Movie of the Week.

programme.title: Vengeance Valley
programme.desc: The sons of a Colorado cattle baron, one biological and the other adopted, resent one another and fight for control of their father's cattle empire.

programme.title: Idaho
programme.desc: Western icon Roy Rogers, along with his trusty companion Trigger, are back for another adventure. This time, a respected judge is being framed for murder by a crooked saloon owner. Always the valiant champion, Rogers vows to clear the name of the judge and find the truth all while courting a lovely beau. Cellist turned editor turned Republic Pictures workhorse Joseph Kane takes the reins of this rousing, musical adventure, which features a number of original songs performed by Rogers himself, with the help of singer-songwriter Bob Nolan and character actor Smiley Burnette (TVs Petticoat Junction).

programme.title: The Gunman from Bodie
programme.desc: The Rough Riders, a popular group that thrilled audiences in the early 1940s, are after a gang of rustlers in this B-western from Hollywood's Poverty Row. Starring Buck Jones, Tim McCoy, and Raymond Hatton, this movie features everything from lawmen going undercover to the Rough Riders looking after an orphaned baby! Also, be on the lookout for the beautiful Christine McIntyre, who would go on to appear in several of the Three Stooges shorts for Colombia Pictures.

programme.title: The Red Rope
programme.desc: Hired killers and Old West outlaws stand front and center in this riveting tale from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Bob Steele, one of the busiest stars in movie history (everything from the silent era to Republic Pictures to working with Clint Eastwood in Hang Em High) is here as Tom Shaw, the target of a bad mans desperation and hate. Steele appeared in more than 240 movies and television shows, but was never more impressive than in The Red Rope!

programme.title: The Terror of Tiny Town
programme.desc: Some incredibly small actors were hired to star in this peculiar cult film. It's all about the villainous Bat Haines (Little Billy Rhodes), who is wreaking havoc on Tiny Town. Can Buck Lawson (Billy Curtis) and the townspeople band together and drive him away? This oddity, which was originally distributed by Columbia Pictures, was directed by one of the most prolific low budget filmmakers in Hollywood history, Sam Newfield, a man with over 200 movies to his credit. While it has appeared on many Worst of all time lists, it deserves to be seen at least once!

programme.title: Springtime in the Sierras
programme.desc: Ads for this Roy Rogers classic roared HEAD FOR THE MUSICAL HILLS...ROY IS GUNNIN' FOR THRILLS! And thrills are what you'll get when you watch this fun, action packed B-Western from Republic Pictures. There's some great comic relief from Andy Devine and Chester Conklin, two of Hollywood's all-time greats. This old-fashioned shoot-'em-up was directed by William Witney, who would go on to direct many of television's top western sagas, including Bonanza, Wagon Train, and The Wild, Wild West.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: In this episode, the scourge of the Southwest is a ruthless and devious killer known as the Sidewinder. When a hapless Cavalryman escorting the criminal falls victim to his tricks, Pat and Sonny set out to track him down and bring him in. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. This episode, Stolen Dynamite, stars Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan. In this episode, the G-men nab a beautiful spy.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe is pelted with eggs after his team, the Hooterville Hornets, lose a game. Worse, Bedloe is back in town, which is never a good sign. It turns out Bedloe is planning a suroprise inspection with help frmo the railroad. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Kate hires Herby to work as an assistant manager at the hotel, causing Uncle Joe to fear for his position. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho get swindled by a fake cattle buyer. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A rancher is found murdered after he threatens to disinherit his niece. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Matt and Frankie arrivein the California gold fields where Frankie is kidnapped by the infamous bandit Joaquin Murietta. Without his usualy partner, Matt enlists the help of Captain Harry Love. Starring Jim Davis, Mary Castle, and Robert Anderson. Look for Rick Jason as Murietta. Jason would later go on to star in the popular ABC war series Combat!

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Following the murder of a railroad agent, Matt and Frankie work to bring the vengeful Tiburcio Vasquez to justice. Starring Jim Davis, mary Castle,Anthony Caruso, Edward Colmas, Lillian Molieri, and Eddie Parker. Also, look for Glenn Strange as Sheriff Billy Rowland. Strange was known for playing Frankenstein's monster in several Universal pictures, as well as a recurring role on Gunsmoke. Also, Eddie Parker, who plays a trapper in this episode, was one of Hollywood's most revered stuntmen. Directed by William Witney. Epsiode oringinally aired in 1954.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, the judge learns of a scheme to smuggle guns and ammo to the Indians, and he encounters an unlikely pair of allies in his plan to break it up: an organ grinder and his monkey. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, the Judge and Jeff take on the richest man in the valley over water rights. Though the rich villain has ensnared young Hugh in outlaw ways, the lawmen are determined to set Hugh on a better path. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie writes to the son of an old female pedlar, unaware that he is a member of an outlaw gang, now on their way to Diablo. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. Also starring Slim Pickens. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S03 : E23 The Saga of Clement O' Toole
programme.desc: Mistaken for a notorious outlaw, a young man struggles to convince the townspeople that he didnt commit a stagecoach robbery. Initially, Annie and Susan Meriwether believe him, but his innocence comes into question when he is present during a bank robbery in which the outlaws seem to recognize him. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye becomes embroiled in a fortune hunter's search for treasure. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild.Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook are assigned to escort an accused criminal to his hanging.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Adam tags along with a wagon train of Quakers passing through town as he is interested in the leaders daughter. Someone, however, intends to take the gold being carried in the wagon train, putting everyone in danger.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Leather Burners
programme.desc: Hopalong Cassidy (William Boyd) gets the call when a herd of rustled cattle mysteriously disappear. Andy Clyde, Victor Jory and George Reeves (televisions Superman!) also star in this, the 42nd of 66 Hopalong Cassidy features. If you look closely, you might even notice Robert Mitchum in an uncredited role!

programme.title: Prairie Pals
programme.desc: IT'S A MODERN GOLD RUSH GANGSTER STYLE! But Three Ridin' Singin' Fightin' Buckaroos Stop 'Em Cold! The Prairie Pals are on the lookout for Wainwright, a scientist who has gone missing after discovering a way to turn vanadium ore into gold. The Prairie Pals start their search at Hank Stoners land, where the vanadium ore can be found. Directed by Sam Newfield; starring Bill Cowboy Rambler Boyd, Art Davis, and Lee Powell.

programme.title: Bad Man of Deadwood
programme.desc: Roy Rogers and Gabby Hayes are together again in this Republic Pictures gem. This time theyre trying to set up a medicine show in Deadwood, a town known for dangerous entrepreneurs who dont like competition. Sally Payne is on-hand as a member of the troop where Roy and Gabby work as entertainers, while Carol Adams plays a reporter who may have a romantic interest in Roy. Songs include Song of the Dusty Trail, and Home on the Rangeland.

programme.title: Colorado
programme.desc: Theres trouble out west! Its the Civil War and the Union needs troops back east to defend itself. Roy Rogers stars as Lieutenant Jerry Burke, who is sent to investigate why the returning troops are being stalled in Colorado. Also starring Gabby Hayes, Pauline Moore, and Milburn Stone, this film is action packed with a turn you wont see coming!

programme.title: Tumbleweeds
programme.desc: The great William S. Hart stars in this classic tale of settlers in the Oklahoma territory. Directed by King Baggot, one of the most versatile movie figures of the silent era, this movie is not only history recorded in heart throbs, as the original print ads boasted, but shows us why Hart is considered by some to be the top western actor of them all. Hart, who directed many of his own films, also had a hand in directing this feature, which turned out to be his last starring role.

programme.title: Randy Rides Alone
programme.desc: John Wayne was 27 when he starred in this vintage western drama from Hollywoods Poverty Row. He plays Randy Bowers, a man wrongly jailed for murders. With help from a female friend, he breaks out of prison and sets out to find the real killers. Harry L. Fraser (The Last of the Clintons, Rustlers Paradise) directs a strong cast of familiar faces, including legendary sidekick George Gabby Hayes, Earl Dwyer, and one of the hardest ridin stuntmen turned actors, Yakima Canutt.

programme.title: The Sundowners
programme.desc: Brother battles brother in this gritty tale of feuding ranchers in the old west. This story of the Texas panhandle stars such familiar faces as Robert Preston, Chill Wills, and Jack Elam, and was a rare film for its time in that it was filmed almost entirely in Texas with no studio interiors. If for no other reason, watch this one for Prestons performance. If you only know him from The Music Man or Victor Victoria, youre sure to be surprised here! (also, look for John Drew Barrymore as Jef Cloud. He was part of the famous Barrymore family, and father of Drew Barrymore.) Jim Strake: Frank Cordell. The Whip: Dave Kashner. Directed by George Templeton

programme.title: Loser's End
programme.desc: This spine-tingling drama of the west stars Jack Perrin as a man out for revenge against an outlaw gang. Other stars include Tina Menard as the woman who helps him along the way, and Elias Lazoroff as the daring Don Carlos. Perrin (Jaws of Justice, The Apache Kid's Escape), was a familiar face in low budget westerns, his career spanning back to the silent era.

programme.title: The Fighting Westerner
programme.desc: A mining engineer tries to solve the murders of several heirs to a valuable radium mine in this western drama from Paramount Pictures. Stars include Charles Chic Sale, and in one of his early roles, Randolph Scott. This feature, also known as Rocky Mountain Mystery, was directed by Oscar winner Charles Barton, who would go on to direct several popular television shows, including Petticoat Junction and Family Affair...

programme.title: Young Bill Hickock
programme.desc: Roy Rogers stars as the title character in this actionpacked feature from Republic Pictures. Starring Sally Payne as Calamity Jane, and Rogerss ongoing sidekick George Gabby Hayes, this twofisted saga relives some of Americas most colorful days, and also has time for a few musical numbers, including Up and Down the Prairie, and When the Shadows Fall Across the Rockies.

programme.title: Broadway to Cheyenne
programme.desc: A gang of big-city thugs trying to set up a protection racket out west meet their match in this B-Western from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Rex Bell, billed on the old print ads as The heroic idol of young America! stars as Breezy Kildare, a New York detective who happens to be in Wyoming. When Breezy leads a group of cattleman against the well-armed city boys, the bad guys will wish theyd stayed in New York! The rest of the cast includes such favorites from the period as George Gabby Hayes, Roy DArcy, and Marceline Day. (Day worked opposite everyone from John Wayne to Buster Keaton, but retired from acting shortly after this movie at age 25.) Directed by Harry L. Fraser.

programme.title: Revenge of the Virgins (Edited Version)
programme.desc: The angry and topless female members of a Native American prepare for battle when white treasure hunters move in on their sacred ground. Peter Perry Jr. (The Secret Sex Lives of Romeo and Juliet) directed this early nudie-cutie from a script by legendary cult filmmaker Ed Wood (Plan Nine from Outer Space). Writing under the pen name Peter LaRoche, Wood churned out this screenplay just before he reinvented himself as the author of seedy adult novels.

programme.title: Riddle Ranch
programme.desc: Black King, the Horse with the Human Brain, starred in four movies. Riddle Ranch turned out to be his swansong in the motion picture business, made under the auspices of his own company, Black King Productions. In it, Black King has to elude Mexican bandits, and evil henchmen who try to maim him before a big race. Julian Rivero (The Red Pony) plays the bad guy who causes all the trouble, and David Worth is the hero who rides Black King to safety.

programme.title: Raiders of the Border
programme.desc: U.S. Marshal Nevada Jack McKenzie (Johnny Mack Brown) and Sandy Hopkins (Raymond Hatton) go undercover to catch jewelry smugglers in this vintage western from Monogram Pictures. This was one of the last films directed by John P. McCarthy (Song of the Gringo, The Oklahoma Cyclone), while Johnny Mack Brown would go on to find great success as Nevada Jack; this was the fourth of 19 films where he played the crime busting marshal.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are ordered to Nugget City to tear down a toll-gate on federal land. They are opposed by a woman mayor who uses the gate to keep out riff-raff and raise money for the town's growing needs. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are sent to Texas when it is discovered that a large number of Federal Gold Bonds held by the State of Texas are counterfeit. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe tries to advertise Shady Rest as a hotel for honeymooners.But is Hooterville really the best place for a honeymoon? Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 A Night at the Hooterville Hilton
programme.desc: Upon reading a fantastical brochure Uncle Joe made, a hotel critic comes to Shady Rest. Can Hooterville live up to Joe's hype? Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho are falsely accused of robbing a stagecoach. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Two bandits impersonate Cisco and Pancho, sending the two to prison for robbery and murder. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was nominated for a PrimeTime Emmy Award in 1951. It was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Jim Davis stars as Matt Clark, a railroad detective who chases outlaws preying on the railroads of the west. In this episode he has to deal with the legendary Chief Crazy Horse (George Keymas) Also starring Mary Castle, Chubby Johnson, John Holland, and Alma Beltran. Directed by William Witney. Episode originally aired in 1954.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detectives Matt and Frankie track down Black Bart, a famous criminal responsible for a string of stage coach robberies. .Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle.Also starring Arthur Space, Sammy Ogg, Marc Hamilton, Frank Sully, and I. StanfordJjolly. Directed by William Witney. Episode first aired in 1954. Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White.Series won an Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, Jeff Taggert's brother is accused of robbing the Del Rio bank. While investigating the case, Jeff is implicated in the hold up. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Sheriff Blade arrives from Comstock to arrest rancher Del Randall, but the Judge thinks the charges are trumped up. Bean and Taggart put Del in jail for safety while they investigate Blade's connection to suspiciously wealthy Mendenhall. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: With the sheriff off looking for an outlaw, a fake sheriff takes his place, leading to a senseless murder. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This enetertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Waiting to hear whether or not gold has been struck in the mine, Annie discovers a beloved stagecoach is being driven by the daughter of the owner, whos threatening to sell the stage so he can pocket the money. When word comes back that there is no gold in the money, Annie becomes suspicious and begins investigating. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: The Mingo False Faces are accused of a series of thefts sweeping the valley.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper.Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook are turned away from a town due to the Black Plague.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Retired U.S. Deputy Marshall Denver McKee struggles to find the suspects responsible for stolen cattle and murdered ranchers.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: New Mexico
programme.desc: What happens when Abraham Lincoln himself comes to New Mexico to discuss a treaty with Native American chief Acoma (Ted de Corsia)? Can the hotbed of emotions be quieted by cavalry Captain Hunt (Lew Ayres)? Or will the Captains superiors insist on provoking with the native tribe? Find out what happens in this fictional tale packed with action from 1951!

programme.title: Texas Brooklyn and Heaven
programme.desc: When Eddie Tayloe (Guy Madison, 5 Against the House) receives $6,000 from his grandfather, he decides to leave his drab newspaper job and move to New York. His dream is to have a play produced on Broadway. Along the way he picks up a pretty hitchhiker (Diana Lynn, The Miracle of Morgan's Creek) who is also leaving her own dreary life for a shot at New York. Unfortunately, they find that the Big Apple is a hard place to make a living. But it's also a city where circumstances keep bringing them together!

programme.title: Jesse James Rides Again
programme.desc: The outlaw Jesse James and his friend are on the run from the law when he is wrongly accused of leading the historic 1876 Northfield, Minnesota bank robbery. With nerve-tensing turns and high-impact action, Jesse rides into a town where a gang is trying to drive area ranchers off their land because there's oil underneath it. Jesse James takes particular interest in the situation of a pretty young woman and her elderly father, whose ranch is being regularly attacked by the gang.

programme.title: West of the Divide
programme.desc: John Wayne stars as Ted Hayden, a tough hombre who goes undercover to join a gang led by a heartless fiend known only as Mr. Gentry (Lloyd Whitlock). Gentry is out to take over a ranch belonging to one of Hayden's friends, but as Hayden finds out, Gentry has a lot more than that up his sleeve. You'll have to watch this two-fisted Western to find out the rest!

programme.title: Clearing the Range
programme.desc: Hoot Gibson stars in this reworking of the Zorro legend with a western setting. For trivia buffs: Hoot was married to his leading lady, Sally Eilers, at the time this film was released.

programme.title: The Outlaw
programme.desc: Billy the Kid, Pat Garrett, and Doc Holliday ride again in Howard Hughes' epic 1943 western, but the character you'll remember most is sultry country vixen Rio McDonald. Hughes' nationwide search for an actress to play Rio resulted in the film debut of Jane Russell, whose natural assets were allegedly helped by a special bra designed by Hughes. When The Outlaw finally received a nationwide release in 1946, its success vindicated Hughes and made Russell a star. As for Hughes' infamous bra, Russell said in her 1988 memoir, I never wore it, and he never knew.

programme.title: Mason of the Mounted
programme.desc: Canadian Mountie Mason is sent south of the border to look for a horse thief with only a watch chain for evidence. He befriends young Andy and when Calhoun hits Andy, Mason and Calhoun fight. In the scuffle Calhoun's watch with the missing chain is dislodged. Mason then sets out to bring in Calhoun and his gang.

programme.title: Hellgate (Edited Version)
programme.desc: In 1867 Kansas, veterinarian Sterling Hayden treats an injured stranger who turns out to have been a guerrilla raider--and Hayden soon finds himself serving a term in one of the world's most terrifying prisons under sadistic commandant Ward Bond. Adapted from the story of Dr. Mudd, the physician who attended John Wilkes Booth, assassin of President Lincoln.

programme.title: Rawhide Rangers
programme.desc: Blackie's gang is creating havoc and the Ranger, Brand Calhoun and his brother go to investigate.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan. In Ghost Bushwackers, the G-Men are authorized by the Army to do undercover work in the lawless Arizona territory.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan. In this episode, the G-Men seek out stolen gold.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Homer Bedloe (Charles Lane) threatens to close down the Cannonball on Christmas Eve, disrupting the Shady Rest hotel's holiday plans. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Directed by Guy Scarpita. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: When Herby (Don Washbrook) gets drafted, Kate tries to cheer him up by saying he could become an astronaut. Could hooterville actually send someone ito the space program? Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho must prove their innocence when they are accused of killing the assistant to the sheriff in Bonanza.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 .This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco tries to help a beautiful woman prove that her brother is innocent after he's arrested for murder.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode first aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Matt and Frankie head to Bannack, Montana where they face off against the corrupt sheriff Henry Plummer.Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Also starring John Dehner, Lane Bradford, and Bill kennedy. Directed by William Witney. Episode first aired in 1954. Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White. Series won an Emmy in 1955 .(This episode also features Kristine Miller, who would become a semi-regular in the series.)

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detective Frankie is mistaken as the girlfriend of criminal Bill Longley at the circus. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Also starring Douglas Kennedy, Marlo Dwyer, and Harry Hayden. Directed by William Witney. Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White. Episode first aired in 1954..Series won an Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. When a young man seeking his birthright is accused of murder he makes a run for it. After a posse incurs several more deaths the Judge begins to realize things don't add up. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: In this episode, Sharon Bender intends to marry Adam over the objections of wealthy father Dan. When Dan's killing is announced, Adam is jailed and a lynch mob forms. The Judge and Taggart have their doubts wondering if a murder even occurred. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Annie Calls Her Shots
programme.desc: After a jailed Dobie escapes from jail, Dobie and Tagg find themselves kidnapped, forcing a desperate Annie to rescue her brother. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Valley of the Shadows
programme.desc: Annie tries to help a blind girl find her father's killer. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. Directed by Robert G. Walker. Also starring Judy Nugent, Forrest Taylor, and Denver Pyle. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: A young man seeks vengeance against the Shawnee for the murder of his parents. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook go up against two thieves with stolen identities. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben Cartwright gives a strip of fertile farming land to an Indian who had previously saved Bens life. Things take a deadly turn, however, when the land ends up being next to a very racist farmer.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Sunset Carson Rides Again
programme.desc: Sunset Carson is trying to raise money for a new school and his partner Sam Webster is out to stop him. When Carson plans a benefit prize-fight, Webster plans to make off with the proceeds. Direted by Oliver Drake; starring Sunset Carson, Al Terry, Pat Starling, Ron Ormond, Joe Hiser.

programme.title: My Pal Trigger
programme.desc: Roy Rogers goes to jail after hes wrongly accused of killing Gabby Hayes horse in this action packed yarn from Republic Pictures. All of the old jokes about cowboys kissing their horse may have started with this very movie, as it focuses on Roys loving relationship with Trigger, the greatest horse in all of Hollywood. The film also features Roys beloved Dale Evans, plus, adding some country swing to the musical numbers is Roys favorite backing band, the Sons of the Pioneers! Songs include Ole Faithful, Long, Long Ago and Livin Western Style.

programme.title: Aces and Eights
programme.desc: Hard-hitting cowboy star Tim McCoy appears as Gentleman Tim Madigan, a legendary card sharp who uses his skills at the gaming table to help a Mexican family keep their ranch. There's plenty of action and intrigue in this modestly budgeted western from Puritan Pictures, capably dished out by prolific director Sam Newfield (The Terror of Tiny Town). For those who take their western action straight, you'll be glad to know there's no singing in this one. It's just Gentleman Tim dealing a death hand in a crooked game!

programme.title: Ridin' On
programme.desc: Sometimes it took nothing less than sheer brutality to bring law and order to the untamed West! In this exciting feature from the glory days of quickie westerns, Tom Tyler plays Tom Roarke, a no-nonsense man of his time who can hit hard with either hand. He finds himself in a feud with Danny O'Neil (Rex Lease), who has been accused of cattle rustling and murder. Yet, Roarke suspects O'Neill might be innocent, and that the entire feud has been a frame job. Now he wants to find the real killer!

programme.title: Way of the West
programme.desc: Government agent Gordon (Hal Taliaferro) goes undercover to investigate an ongoing war between cattlemen and sheepmen. But he soon finds himself framed for murder! This low budget western from the short-lived Empire Pictures is from the golden era of shoot em ups, when audiences knew who the bad guys were, and couldnt wait for the good guys to serve up some just punishment!

programme.title: Man from Utah
programme.desc: WHIRLING ROPES AND SNARLING GUNS IN THE GALLOPING GRIP OF A GLAMOROUS DRAMA! John Wayne stars as John Weston, a man hired to investigate shady doings at a local rodeo. It seems all the riders who are on the verge of winning end up dead. Along with Wayne, this tale of action on the range also stars the usual Lone Star Picture stock company, including Gabby Hayes and Yakima Canutt!

programme.title: The Deadly Companions
programme.desc: An unholy alliance! Marking the feature film debut of one of Hollywoods most influential and widely referenced auteur directors, Sam Peckinpah, The Deadly Companions centers on a redemptive journey to escort a funeral procession through dangerous Indian Territory. Featuring fine work from a top-notch cast that includes the inimitable Maureen OHara at the height of her illustrious career, Peckinpahs first foray into film provides a promising glance into the energetic and violent nature of his iconic later works.

programme.title: Marmaduke - pies na fali
programme.desc: Ekranizacja sławnej, długo nadawanego komiksu o wielkim psie o imieniu Marmaduke

programme.title: Awake
programme.desc: Podczas operacji zamożny młody mężczyzna doświadcza świadomości śródoperacyjnej i odkrywa, że zespół operacyjny chciał go zamordować.

programme.title: Zjawa
programme.desc: Hugh Glass zostaje zaatakowany przez niedźwiedzia. Ledwo żywy, pozostawiony na pewną śmierć, wbrew wszystkiemu stara się przeżyć. Zmagając się z bezlitosnymi zimowymi warunkami, desperacko brnie przez dzikie tereny, gnany miłością do rodziny i nieokiełznaną żądzą zemsty.

programme.title: Lekarstwo na życie
programme.desc: Młody mężczyzna przybywa do sielankowego spa w szwajcarskich Aplach, aby zabrać stamtąd swojego szefa. Mężczyzna szybko odkrywa, że cudowne leczenie skrywa mroczny sekret.

programme.title: Krasnal
programme.desc: Filmowy debiut Jennifer Aniston w horrorze o szalonym, sześciusetletnim karle, który popełnia serię morderstw w całej Dakocie Północnej.

programme.title: Jumper
programme.desc: Thriller Science Ficition to skok w inny wymiar. JUMPER to opowieść o niezwykłych przygodach człowieka, który odkrywa, że ma ekscytującą zdolność teleportowania się, gdziekolwiek tylko zechce.

programme.title: Marley i ja
programme.desc: Świeżo upieczeni małżonkowie John i Jenny Grogan (Owen Wilson i Jennifer Aniston) myślą o założeniu rodziny.

programme.title: Agent XXL: Rodzinny interes
programme.desc: Malcolm Turner oraz jego nastoletni pasierb Trent w przebraniu kobiet badają sprawę morderstwa w szkole artystycznej dla dziewcząt.

programme.title: A ty myślałeś; że twoi rodzice są dziwni!
programme.desc: Sympatyczny robot imieniem Newman zabierze Josha i Maxa na najbardziej fantastyczną przygodę ich życia.

programme.title: Zaginiona dziewczyna
programme.desc: ZAGINIONA DZIEWCZYNA - w reżyserii Davida Finchera i oparta na światowym bestsellerze Gillian Flynn - ujawnia tajemnice skrywane przez współczesne małżeństwo.

programme.title: Heat - Gorączka
programme.desc: Neil McCauley (Robert De Niro), złodziej wysokiej rangi, wzbił się na szczyt kariery dzięki inteligencji, czujności oraz byciu nieuchwytnym. Detektyw Vince Hanna (Al Pacino) jest niezawodny w swoim fachu i tym razem wziął na swój cel McCauleya.

programme.title: The Dog Who Saved Easter
programme.desc: To od Zeusa i jego nowych przyjaciół zależy ocalenie Wielkanocy, którą niemal niweczy stare i nowe poczucie zemsty.

programme.title: Programming will resume shortly
programme.desc: We're catching up on our beauty sleep! Stay tuned for more priceless entertainment curated by Rakuten TV.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Boo 2! A Madea Halloween
programme.desc: Nie lękajcie się – Madea i jej przyjaciele wrócili w przerażająco śmiesznej kontynuacji komediowego hitu Tylera Perry’ego! Gdy córka Briana (Tyler Perry) wymyka się na imprezę na nawiedzonym kempingu, Madea, Bam, Hattie i Joe ruszają na piekielnie zabawną misję.

programme.title: Waiting...
programme.desc: Young employees at Shenaniganz restaurant collectively stave off boredom and adulthood with their antics.

programme.title: Ilu miałaś facetów?
programme.desc: Ally Darling jest zaniepokojona po przeczytaniu artykułu w gazecie, według którego ludzie, którzy mieli 20 lub więcej partnerów zaprzepaścili szansę na znalezienie prawdziwej miłości.

programme.title: Piekło dantego
programme.desc: Oparty na grze Epic Animation, którą każdy musi mieć, animowany film fabularny „Piekło Dantego” podąża za Dantem w oszałamiającej podróży przez dziewięć kręgów piekła.

programme.title: Intersections
programme.desc: Małżeństwo spędzające miesiąc miodowy w Maroku przeżywa śmiertelny wypadek samochodowy na środku pustyni.

programme.title: Summoned
programme.desc: Po latach ktoś lub coś zabija członków ławy przysięgłych (Cuba Gooding Jr., Ashley Scott), którzy wydawali wyrok podczas najgłośniejszej sprawy seryjnego zabójcy z San Francisco.

programme.title: Czas zabijania
programme.desc: Stare nawyki ciężko wykorzenić... Zwłaszcza na zmieniającym się południu USA. Carl Lee Hailey, pracownik fabryki w Mississippi dowiaduje się tego, gdy jego dziesięcioletnia siostra zostaje brutalnie napadnięta przez dwóch pijanych rasistów.

programme.title: The Negotiator
programme.desc: Danny Roman, biegły policyjny negocjator, chce oczyścić się z fałszywych zarzutów, więc przetrzymuje grupę zakładników w biurowcu, by zyskać czas potrzebny na odkrycie prawdy. Chris Sabian, tytułowy „Negocjator”, podejmuje próbę rozładowania sytuacji i zaangażowania Romana.

programme.title: Where's the Money?
programme.desc: W tej skandalicznie śmiesznej komedii Del, sprytny młodzieniec wychowany na ulicach South Central Los Angeles, dowiaduje się, że jego osadzony ojciec wraz z wujkiem, który właśnie wyszedł na wolność (Terry Crews), ukradli milion dolarów i pieniądze ukryli w piwnicy noclegowni.

programme.title: Najczarniejsza godzina
programme.desc: Piątka młodzieńców musi zdać się na własne siły podczas próby przetrwania ataku obcych w Moskwie.

programme.title: Diplomatic Siege
programme.desc: Specjalista od usuwania bomb Steve Mitchell zostaje wysłany do ambasady USA w Bukareszcie, aby rozbroić bombę atomową, ale jego misja zostaje przerwana, gdy grupa terrorystów szturmuje budynek i bierze zakładników.

programme.title: Blood Brother
programme.desc: Jake trafia do więzienia, chroniąc swoich przyjaciół. W międzyczasie jego najlepszy kumpel, Chris, wyrywa się z przestępczego świata i zostaje policjantem. Gdy po 15 latach Jake wychodzi na wolność, rozpoczyna krwawą wendettę.

programme.title: Piąty wymiar
programme.desc: Sztorm wywraca jacht z grupą przyjaciół na pokładzie. Przepływający statek pasażerski, który jest dla nich jedyną szansą schronienia, okazuje się opustoszały.

programme.title: Deadfall
programme.desc: Przygotujcie się na gęstą sieć uwodzenia, zdrady, zabójstwa i chciwości w ekscytującym thrillerze z udziałem Michaela Biehna, Jamesa Coburna i Nicolasa Cage'a.

programme.title: Marmaduke - pies na fali
programme.desc: Ekranizacja sławnej, długo nadawanego komiksu o wielkim psie o imieniu Marmaduke

programme.title: Marley i ja
programme.desc: Świeżo upieczeni małżonkowie John i Jenny Grogan (Owen Wilson i Jennifer Aniston) myślą o założeniu rodziny.

programme.title: Big Short
programme.desc: Oparta na prawdziwych wydarzeniach historia czterech outsiderów, którzy zobaczyli to, czego nie chciały widzieć wielkie banki, media i rząd: upadek światowej gospodarki. Śmiała inwestycja prowadzi ich w mroczne meandry bankowości, gdzie wszystko jest podejrzane.

programme.title: Pajac za burtą
programme.desc: Młody komik, któremu się nie wiedzie, podejmuje się pracy fizycznej na wycieczkowcu, gdzie ma nadzieję złapać wiatr w żagle i zrobić karierę w przemyśle rozrywkowym.

programme.title: Jumper

programme.title: Szalone Wesele 2
programme.desc: Druga córka Wasilija chce wyjść za mąż. Ojciec protestuje przeciwko jej wyborowi i próbuje nie dopuścić do ślubu.

programme.title: Golden Shoes
programme.desc: Młody chłopak oddaje serce narodu, gdy pokonuje zastraszanie, nietolerancję i tragiczną sytuację domową, aby realizować swoje marzenie o grze w piłkę nożną.

programme.title: Snajperzy
programme.desc: Podczas wojny antyjapońskiej Yang Haotian, żołnierz Nowej 4. Armii, prowadzi swoich poległych towarzyszy z powrotem do swojej jednostki, gdy spotyka Qin Yu, oficera wywiadu nacjonalistycznego, ściganego przez Japończyków w Lost Cloud Ridge.

programme.title: The Dog Who Saved Easter
programme.desc: To od Zeusa i jego nowych przyjaciół zależy ocalenie Wielkanocy, którą niemal niweczy stare i nowe poczucie zemsty.
